packs.title: surpass your limits!
packs.description: High-energy action music perfect for intense gameplay moments, boss battles, and adventure sequences. Features driving chiptune melodies with modern production.

packs.title: Liminal Spaces
packs.description: Unsettling ambient soundscapes for horror games and atmospheric experiences. Creates tension through subtle dissonance and eerie textures.

packs.title: Pixel Adventure
packs.description: Classic 8-bit inspired music for platformers and retro-style games. Catchy melodies and energetic rhythms.
